III.i.1.A.5.a
.
Requesting Pay Records
When pay records are required to verify periods of IADT and ADT, or make other determinations, submit the request through the
AskDFAS Military Pay Request Portal
.
Exception
:  Contact the Compensation Service
MilPay corporate mailbox
for assistance obtaining Coast Guard pay records.
Each branch has a specific set of selections claims processors must use beyond the default required information.  Use the following table to determine which specific selections are necessary to properly request pay records for each branch of service.
Branch of Service
Selections or Information to Provide
Army
Air Force/Space Force
CATEGORY
:
Military Pay Records Requests
SUBCATEGORY
:  Select appropriate request based on the date range of records.
REASON FOR REQUEST
(if required):
VA Claims
Marine Corps
CATEGORY
:
Separation Pay Verification
SUBCATEGORY
:
USMC VA DSP/Seps Pay Verification
SPECIAL INSTRUCTIONS
:  [
Provide details about the records VA is requesting.
]
Navy
CATEGORY
:
Separation Pay Verification
SUBCATEGORY
:
Navy Member Information
SPECIAL INSTRUCTIONS
:  [
Provide details about the records VA is requesting.
]
Important
:
Save a copy of the submitted request for association with the claims folder, following instructions in
M21-1, Part III, Subpart i, 1.A.5.b
.
Attaching a copy of the
DD Form 214
,
DD Form 256, Honorable Discharge Certificate
,
DD Form 257, General Discharge Certificate
, or
NGB Form 22
, is required when submitting a request via the portal.
Reference
:   For more information about the
AskDFAS Military Pay Request Portal
, see the
AskDFAS User Guide
.
